title: Dead Synchronicity: Tomorrow Comes Today 1.0.12 – Featured Point & Click Adventure Game

title: BLACKHOLE 1.0 – An award-winning hardcore platformer game
content: BLACKHOLE is an award-winning hardcore platformer with over 15 hours of story-driven sci-fi comedy and gravity-twisting puzzles.   When the crew of the spaceship Endera is sucked into a black hole, it seems like the end. Fortunately, the ship crashes on Entity – an unidentified object resembling a planet. After the crash, the first member […]

title: Goetia 1.0 – A point & click ghost adventure game
content: The ruins of any village are the silent testament to its final moments. The ruins of Oakmarsh are no different. Their telling silence, the dust blanketing what was once a quiet village near Coventry.   The name of a manor and the family that lived within. A perverted and mad lineage, a clan whose final […]

title: Decay – The Mare 1.0 – A new psychological horror adventure game
content: Decay – The Mare is a 3D psychological horror adventure and homage to the Resident Evil and Silent Hill games, as well as to horror adventure games like Phantasmagoria, The 11th Hour and Gabriel Knight.   For the first time the compelling, high-tension Adventure is available in one package, including an exclusive third chapter that […]

title: Poster 1.6 – Post photos and video to the Web
content: Poster enables you to post photos and videos to the web. Poster can send photos and videos to Flickr, SmugMug, Facebook profiles and Facebook pages.   Poster sports a sleek design that lets you see your photos properly and work with them effortlessly. title: PhoneDirector 1.8.0 – Phonebook, SMS, and calendar for Nokia series 40 phones
content: PhoneDirector gives you control when working with your Nokia phone in Phonebook editing, SMS, Gallery, Calendar, To-Do, Java, WAP, Radio, and Notes.   Main features: phonebook editing, deleting, backup, export and import (extended phonebook with more numbers and texts is supported) SMS reading from the phone, sending, replying, forwarding, deleting, archiving uploading pictures, sounds and […]

title: Disk Map Analyzer 1.5 – Clean Your Hard Drive Space

title: The Final Take 1.0 – Indie, Adventure & Horror Game
content: Relive dark footage recorded from the perspective of multiple characters in this unique first person horror. title: XRevert 3.0 – Reverts icons and UI elements to those of prior OS X versions
content: XRevert (was YosemiteRevert) changes application icons, system icons (such as the folder icon), menu bar icons, and more, as well as the system font, in OS X 10.10 Yosemite and later back to the way they were in prior versions of OS X. It also makes changes to aesthetics, such as the “traffic light icons” […]
